page.title: 09GOVERNMENT LYTHE
page.content: The top tier of Local Government is the North Yorkshire County Council who meet in County Hall Northallerton.They are responsible for the main roads,the education service,the police service, the social services,and the part-time fire service.In order to fulfil this obligation, they levy the County Rate. The second tier is the District Council-the Scarborough Borough Council who levy a Borough Rate and sanction a Parish Rate. The third tier of local government is the Parish Council,which consists of elected local people.This Parish Council meets every month alternatively at Lythe and Sandsend.
